name: Redeemia Ltd
overview:
Our mission is to search the whole internet to find you the deals that you will love.

There are so many daily deal sites out there now…how can you be sure you’re getting the best deals without signing up for hundreds of e-mails or downloading loads of apps? Redeemia has the best deals from Groupon, KGB Deals, Wowcher… and loads more all in one place.

So, we have a lot of deals!….but how can you find the deals you actually want in this jungle?! Redeemia lets you filter deals based on the things you like.

Daily deals aren’t around for long….it’s easy to miss a deal you’d love. Tell us the things you like and Redeemia will send you live deal alerts to your mobile so you never miss another deal.
